Docs.summary: Determines if an instance of can be converted to a <xref:System.String>.
Docs.returns: if can be converted into a <xref:System.String>; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Conversion is possible only if `value` is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> type. In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A> property for `value` cannot be `null` or equal to <xref:System.String.Empty>, which identifies `value` as an anonymous <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Conversion is possible only if `value` is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> type.
